name: Fusion (itch) (darnok333)
description:
Game made during Clicker Jam Autumn 2022 Fusion...The nuclear reaction that powers the Sun and the stars. Use it to travel through Spacetime. Your mission is to be the firstto navigate through the time dimension by achieving the speed of light (299 792 458 m / s). Reach the unknown until the end of everything.
